title: Seattle Park District Board Meeting 9/6/22
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Approval of Agenda, Approval of Minutes; Public Comment; Resolution 49: amending the bylaws of the Seattle Park District to modify the process for appointment of the Seattle Park District Treasurer; Resolution 50: appointing the City of Seattle Director of Finance as Seattle Park District Treasurer; Mayor Harrell’s Proposed Seattle Park District Six-Year Spending Plan 2023-2028.
0:00 Call to Order
2:00 Public Comment
5:35 Resolution 49: amending the bylaws of the Seattle Park District 
8:33 Resolution 50: appointing the Seattle Park District Treasure
10:45 Mayor Harrell’s Proposed Seattle Park District Six-Year Spending Plan
